item.title: 匈牙利汽车和电池行业下滑幅度为 2023 年以来最大
item.description: 由于外部对汽车和电池的需求疲软导致产量大幅下降，匈牙利的工业出现了一年多来最大的滑坡。【原文：Hungary’s industry had the biggest slump in more than a year as weak external demand for cars and batteries caused a significant decline in production.】

item.title: 滞留在印度禁船上的俄罗斯石油找到了新油轮
item.description: 船舶跟踪数据显示，被印度港口当局拒绝装船的一船俄罗斯原油目前正被转移到另一艘油轮上，这表明贸易商正在想方设法绕过监管障碍，以保证敏感货物的运输。【原文：A cargo of Russian crude that was on a ship rejected by Indian port authorities is now being transferred to another tanker, ship-tracking data show, a sign of how traders are finding ways to skirt regulatory hurdles to keep sensitive freight moving.】

item.title: 瑞典核心通胀率保持稳定，支持央行观点
item.description: 上个月，瑞典的核心通胀率出乎意料地保持了增长速度，这让那些认为近期物价上涨只是暂时现象的政策制定者们感到欣慰。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation unexpectedly kept pace last month, vindicating the policymakers who have dismissed the recent surge in price growth as temporary.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行确认目标，本季度盈利能力上升
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）表示，预计第一季度衡量盈利能力的一项关键指标将有所上升，这也是西班牙最大的贷款机构在今年年初表现如何的首个指标。【原文：Banco Santander SA said it expects a key measure of profitability to rise in the first quarter, in the first indication of how Spain’s largest lender fared at the start of the year.】

item.title: 雅德尼称美股暴跌提供了 "绝佳的购买机会
item.description: 华尔街资深人士爱德华-亚达尼（Edward Yardeni）认为，在市场担心经济衰退的情况下，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策遭到了市场的反弹，投资者应该买入跌势中的美股。【原文：Investors should buy the dip in US stocks as the market is rebuffing President Donald Trump’s tariff policy amid fears of a recession, according to Wall Street veteran Edward Yardeni.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单在特朗普征收关税前未见改善
item.description: 在世界经济为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提高进口关税和颠覆全球供应链做好准备之际，德国工厂订单在 2 月份意外地没有增加。【原文：German factory orders unexpectedly failed to increase in February as the world economy prepared for US President Donald Trump to ratchet up import duties and upend global supply chains.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数直播：关税引发的股灾后，股市将扩大跌幅
特朗普称正在审查关税，印度医药股下挫
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统表示美国仍在考虑对药品征收关税后，印度制药商的股价出现下滑。【原文：Shares of Indian drugmakers slumped after President Donald Trump said US tariffs on pharmaceuticals are still under consideration.】

item.title: 增长忧虑笼罩市场，澳大利亚股市和汇价下跌
item.description: 周五，全球避险情绪重创澳大利亚市场，股市将进入调整期，交易商也加大了对快速降息的押注，以保护经济免受美国贸易关税的影响。【原文：The global flight to safety pummeled Australia’s markets Friday, with stocks set to enter a correction and traders ratcheting bets on quick rate cuts to shield the economy from the impact of US trade tariffs.】

item.title: 这砸碎的声音就是世界各地的储蓄罐
item.description:
乏味的希腊方程式不能作为关税制度的基础，市场也不会对此留下深刻印象。【原文：

Dodgy Greek equations are no basis for a system of tariffs, and markets aren’t impressed.

】

item.title: 关税促使日产汽车停止在美国订购墨西哥制造的 SUV
item.description: 日产汽车公司决定停止在美国市场销售两款墨西哥制造的英菲尼迪越野车，以回应唐纳德-特朗普总统对汽车进口征收的全面关税。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. decided to stop selling a pair of Mexican-built Infiniti SUVs in the US market, in response to President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs on car imports.】

item.title: 欧佩克+增加供应，石油市场指标发出供应过剩即将到来的信号
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）及其盟国在市场对全球需求的担忧日趋严重之际，提前大幅增加供应，令市场大跌眼镜。【原文：Key oil indicators are signaling looser balances ahead, after OPEC and its allies shocked the market with a dramatic early supply increase just as concerns over global demand become more acute.】

item.title: 随着关税放宽，菲律宾希望向美国出口更多薯片和食品
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对马尼拉征收低于地区同行的关税后，菲律宾正努力增加对美国的出口。【原文：The Philippines is seeking to increase its exports to the US after President Donald Trump imposed tariffs on Manila that are lower compared with its regional peers.】

item.title: 新 "黑金 "需要更多公牛
item.description:
世界需要更加看好生物碳及其对大气的益处。【原文：

The world needs to be more bullish on biochar and its benefits to the atmosphere.

】

item.title: 国债面临外国买家因关税报复而罢工的风险
item.description: 随着投资者对唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面关税和报复风险进行博弈，交易员们正在讨论的一个问题是，外国人是否会缩减国债购买量。【原文：As investors game out President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs and the risks of retaliation, one question traders are debating is whether foreigners might scale back Treasury purchases.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德收购管道运营商 Colonial Enterprises
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德基础设施合伙公司（Brookfield Infrastructure Partners LP）及其机构联营公司同意收购美国最大的燃料管道运营商 Colonial Enterprises Inc.【原文：Brookfield Infrastructure Partners LP and its institutional associates agreed to acquire Colonial Enterprises Inc., the operator of the biggest US fuel pipeline.】

item.title: 印尼寻求与美国谈判，承诺放宽贸易壁垒
item.description: 美国计划对东南亚最大经济体的产品征收 32% 的关税，印尼在寻求与美国就该计划进行谈判的同时，承诺放宽贸易规则。【原文：Indonesia pledged to ease trade rules as it seeks to negotiate with the US on the latter’s plan to impose a 32% tariff on products from Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 哈佛被告知终止 DEI 和禁用面具，资金威胁详解
item.description: 特朗普政府在哈佛大学周四收到的一封信中详细阐述了它希望哈佛大学做出的一系列改变，几天前，特朗普政府还威胁要停止向该校提供多达 90 亿美元的联邦资金。【原文：The Trump administration detailed a raft of changes it wants from Harvard University in a letter received by the school Thursday, days after threatening to end as much as $9 billion in federal funding for the school.】

item.title: 瑞银财富下调美股评级，因关税打击而下调目标值
item.description: 瑞银全球财富管理公司（UBS Global Wealth Management）下调了美国股市的评级，警告称由于全球最大经济体受到对等关税的影响，市场将长期波动，并对全球经济增长产生深远影响。【原文：UBS Global Wealth Management downgraded US equities, warning of prolonged market volatility due to the impact of reciprocal tariffs on the world’s largest economy, and far-reaching implications for global growth.】

item.title: 关税恐慌笼罩市场，越南股市连续第二天下滑
item.description: 由于美国对越南征收关税，越南股市连续第二天下挫，正向2024年1月以来的最低水平迈进。【原文：Vietnam’s stocks are heading for their lowest level since January 2024 as US tariffs on the nation extend the market selloff to a second day.】

item.title: 津巴布韦放弃美元的计划因 ZiG 紧缩而失败
item.description: 津巴布韦的流动性紧缩加深了该国经济对美元的依赖，削弱了政府近一年前推出的金银支持货币。【原文：A liquidity crunch in Zimbabwe is deepening the economy’s embrace of the US dollar and undermining the bullion-backed currency introduced by the government almost a year ago.】

item.title: 印度小盘股在特朗普加征关税后逆转全球跌势
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 万斯淡化市场 "糟糕的一天"，承诺日后将迎来繁荣
item.description: 白宫淡化了唐纳德-特朗普总统关税议程的直接影响，副总统JD Vance试图将全球股市的溃败说成是暂时的痛苦。【原文：Vice President JD Vance sought to cast a global rout in stocks as a temporary pain as the White House downplayed the immediate effects of President Donald Trump’s tariff agenda.】

item.title: 前景暗淡，日本银行股领跌，收益率下降
item.description: 由于美国加征关税使日本经济前景暗淡，并推低了加息预期，日本股市暴跌，银行股大幅下挫，政府债券收益率走低。【原文：Japanese shares tumbled, with sharp declines in banking stocks and lower government bond yields as US tariffs darkened the nation’s economic outlook and pushed back expectations for interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 日本央行上田希望在关税扰乱市场后传递连续性
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最新宣布的关税政策扰乱了金融市场之后，日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）和他的副手试图传达相对平静和政策连续性的信息。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda and his deputy sought to convey relative calm and policy continuity after Donald Trump’s latest tariff announcement upended financial markets.】

item.title: 墨西哥贸易谈判代表表示可能加快《美国与墨西哥关于建立更紧密经贸关系的协定》（USMCA）的讨论进程
item.description: 墨西哥的一位顶级贸易谈判代表表示，有关北美自由贸易协定未来的讨论可能会比原计划提前进行。【原文：Discussions over the future of the North American free trade pact could be pushed earlier than originally planned, said one of Mexico’s top trade negotiators.】

item.title: 马来西亚企业反对特朗普关税后的新税制
item.description: 在美国以成本压力为由宣布对东南亚国家征收 24% 的互惠关税后，马来西亚制造商正敦促政府今年不要引入额外的税收负担。【原文：Malaysian manufacturers are urging the government to refrain from introducing additional tax burdens this year after the US announced a 24% reciprocal tariff on the Southeast Asian country, citing cost pressures.】

item.title: 三星遭美国芯片限制，Seven & i 寻求立足之地
item.description: 三星电子公司的利润可能受到代工业务亏损的影响，因为该公司正在努力追赶人工智能存储芯片的开发，而美国的出口限制则导致对中国的半导体出货量下降。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s profit was probably held back by a loss in the foundry business as the company works to catch up in artificial intelligence memory chip development, while US export restrictions contributed to lower semiconductor shipments to China.】

item.title: 越南要求美国推迟关税并参与谈判
item.description: 越南贸易部已要求特朗普政府暂停对进口越南产品征收 46%关税的计划，并进行进一步谈判。【原文：Vietnam’s trade ministry has asked the Trump administration to put on hold its planned 46% tariff on imported Vietnamese products and engage in further negotiations.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老金数千账户遭受网络攻击
item.description: 上周，澳大利亚最大的几家养老基金遭到了疑似网络攻击，数千名成员的个人数据可能遭到泄露。【原文：Some of Australia’s largest pension funds were hit by a suspected cyber attack in the past week that potentially compromised the personal data of thousands of members.】
